name: CyberDrome_2085
description:
CyberDrome_2085 is a prototype Anti-Grav racer made for fun after a game analysis of Mario Kart Tour.

I thought it would be interesting to take gameplay elements from an antigrav racer and combine elements from Mario Kart Tour's core loop. There's a bit more on it here if you're interested.

Controls

Use the arrow keys to move left and right and back to break. 

Software & Attribution

  • Unity
  • Playmaker
  • Probuilder
  • Hover kit
  • 2D Cyberpunk illustration
  • Music loop by frankum
  • UI SFX by unfa
  • Collect SFX by Divoljud
